content: **crochet drops tunic with mussel pattern with 1 thread alpaca and 1 thread cotton viscose or bomull-lin size s - xxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** s m l - xl xxl finished measurements at chest 33 -39 3/8 -39 3/8 -41 ¾ -45 full length appr 26 3/8 -27½ -29 1/8 -29½ -31 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 200-200-250-250-300 g color no 1101 white and use drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 300-350-350-400-450 g color no 01 white or use drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 400-450-500-550-600 g colour no 01 white drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h/8 or size needed to obtain the correct gauge **crochet gauge ** 12 treble_crochet x 7 row with 1 thread alpaca and 1 thread cotton vicose or 1 thread bomull-lin = 10 x 10 cm 1 repeat of mussel pattern = width approx 12 cm
